articles.title: Russia wants prisoner swap involving Brittney Griner negotiated without fanfare
articles.description: The Kremlin warned Thursday that a possible prisoner swap with the United States involving Brittney Griner needs to be negotiated quietly without fanfare.
articles.content:
MOSCOW -- The Kremlin warned Thursday that a possible prisoner swap with the United States involving American basketball star Brittney Griner needs to be negotiated quietly without fanfare.

articles.description: Linebacker K.J. Wright has signed a one-day contract with the Seahawks to retire with the franchise for which he played 10 of his 11 NFL seasons.
